actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the designation of income tax payments to the Presidential Election Campaign Fund.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the income tax liability of individuals who designate a contribution to the Presidential Election Campaign Fund by the amount of such designation (one dollar in the case of an individual, two dollars in the case of a joint return where both spouses make such a designation).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the designation of income tax payments to the Presidential Election Campaign Fund.
